response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000 based on your needs and requirements. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features tailored to meet your specific demands, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that not only meets but exceeds your expectations, providing unparalleled benefits and savings. We are confident that this investment will be highly rewarding for you in the long run. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
